settings_general_modeCliHelp: Uses the claude CLI with your OAuth login or subscription.
settings_general_modeApiHelp: Direct API access with your own key. Supports Anthropic and compatible endpoints.
settings_general_modeAutoHelp: Tries claude CLI first, falls back to API key if not available.
settings_general_baseUrlHelp: Leave empty for official Anthropic API. Set for proxies or OpenAI-compatible endpoints.
settings_general_modelsHelp: Comma-separated model names. First model is used as default. Leave empty to use CLI default.
settings_general_setupWizardDesc: Re-run the initial setup wizard to reconfigure CLI and authentication.
settings_general_displayLanguageDesc: Choose the language for the app interface
settings_cliConfig_footer: Changes saved to ~/.claude/settings.json. Project overrides (.claude/settings.json) take precedence.
settings_cliConfig_thinkingModeDesc: Enable extended thinking for complex problems
settings_cliConfig_fastModeDesc: Use faster output (same model, reduced latency)
settings_cliConfig_autoCompactDesc: Automatically compact context when approaching limits
settings_cliConfig_fileCheckpointsDesc: Create file checkpoints for undo/rewind support
settings_cliConfig_verboseDesc: Show detailed tool output and debug info
settings_cliConfig_permissionModeDesc: Default permission mode for new sessions
settings_cliConfig_responseLangDesc: Preferred language for AI responses (e.g. en, zh, ja)
settings_cliConfig_spinnerTipsDesc: Show tips while waiting for responses
settings_cliConfig_codeDiffFooterDesc: Show code diff summary in footer
settings_cliConfig_prStatusFooterDesc: Show PR status in footer bar
settings_remote_desc: Run Claude Code on remote machines via SSH. Requires key-based authentication.
settings_remote_forwardKeyWarning: API key will be visible in process list (ps) on the remote machine. Consider configuring the key directly in remote ~/.claude/settings.json instead.
settings_remote_sshKeyPubMissing: Public key missing. Run this command in terminal to rebuild:
settings_remote_sshKeyCopyCmd: Run this command in terminal to install the key:
settings_remote_sshKeySuccess: Passwordless login works! Key path has been auto-filled.
settings_remote_sshKeyFailed: Connection failed. Run the command above in terminal first, then retry.
settings_remote_cliNotFoundHint: SSH connected but CLI not found. Run this on the remote machine to find the path:
settings_remote_cliNotFoundHint2: Then paste the full path into "Claude CLI Path (remote)" above and test again.
settings_debug_maxEntries: Logs are buffered in memory (max 2000 entries). Open DevTools Console to see live output.
sidebar_selectProjectBrowse: Select a project to browse files.
sidebar_selectProjectGit: Select a project to view git status.
sidebar_startTeamHint: Start a team in Claude Code
statusbar_contextTitle: Context usage for the latest turn ({pct}% of {tokens} tokens). The CLI automatically compacts context when approaching the limit.
statusbar_rewindTitle: Rewind: undo file changes from this session
statusbar_forkTitle: Fork: new session from summarized context
statusbar_endTitle: End the session (process will be killed)
statusbar_cliVersionTitle: Claude CLI v{version} — Click to view release notes
chat_examplePrompt1: Build a login page with email and password
chat_examplePrompt2: Refactor this component to use TypeScript
chat_examplePrompt3: Write unit tests for the auth module
chat_eventSystemFailed: Event system failed to initialize. Some features may not work.
chat_orTypeToStart: or type a message below to start a new chat
chat_typeToStart: Type a message below to start
chat_forkedBanner: This session was forked from a previous conversation.
chat_typeToStartSession: Type a message below to start the session
chat_startSessionHint: Start a session with an AI coding agent
chat_forkingDesc: Creating a new session from summarized context...
plugin_desc: Extend Claude with specialized knowledge and behavior
plugin_deleteSkillMsg: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This removes the entire skill directory.
plugin_uninstallMsg: Are you sure you want to uninstall "{name}"?
plugin_removeMarketplaceMsg: Are you sure you want to remove the "{name}" marketplace?
plugin_loadFailed: Failed to load plugin data. Check the debug console for details.
plugin_couldNotLoad: Could not load: {items}. Some sections may show incomplete data.
plugin_noSkillsFound: No skills found. Try a different search term.
plugin_noContentPreview: No SKILL.md content available for preview.
plugin_skillsEmptyDesc: Skills give Claude specialized knowledge and behavior for specific tasks.
plugin_mcpDesc: Model Context Protocol servers for tool access
plugin_pluginsDesc: Browse, install, and manage plugin packages
plugin_noPluginsMatch: No plugins match your search criteria. Try a different query or category.
plugin_addMarketplaceHint: Add a marketplace in Claude Code to browse plugins.
plugin_installFromMarketplace: Install plugins from the Marketplace to see them here.
plugin_noMarketplaces: No marketplaces registered. Use the input above to add a marketplace source.
team_emptyDesc: Start a team session in Claude Code to see teams here. Team data is read from ~/.claude/teams/.
team_selectTeam: Select a team from the sidebar
usage_firstLoadMessage: First load requires scanning historical session data, please wait... Subsequent loads will be much faster
usage_noUsageData: No usage data yet. Start a session to see usage statistics.
explorer_discardConfirm: You have unsaved changes. Discard them?
explorer_saveDisabledInPreview: Switch to Edit mode to save
runs_startFromChat: Start a conversation from the chat page
runs_adjustSearch: Try adjusting your search or filters
runs_noFavoritesHint: Star a prompt in Search to save it here
memory_setProjectFirst: Set a project working directory first
memory_discardConfirm: You have unsaved changes. Discard them?
cost_tokenLabels: in · out · cache r · cache w
mcp_noServersFound: No servers found. Try a different search term.
mcp_clickToSeeDetails: Click a server to see details
mcp_noPackageFound: No package or remote endpoint found for this server
mcp_useDiscoverTab: Use the Discover tab to find and add MCP servers.
mcp_selectServerDetails: Select a server to see details
cmd_versionContent:
OpenCovibe Desktop v0.1.0
Tauri v2
Svelte 5
perm_shellWarning: This will execute a shell command on your system.
diff_noCwd: No working directory set. Open a project first.
toolbar_planModeTitle: Plan mode: agent reads but doesn't edit files
toolbar_reviewTitle: Ask agent to review recent changes
filesPanel_notLocatable: Cannot locate the corresponding tool call
infoPanel_noInfo: Session info will appear after the session starts.
contextPanel_noData: Context data will appear after the first turn.
setup_cliNotFoundDesc: Install it in your terminal using one of these commands:
setup_setupHint: Or run ./scripts/setup.sh to install everything at once
setup_authDesc: Choose how to authenticate with Claude.
setup_completeBrowser: Complete the authorization in your browser, then return here.
setup_noKeyNeeded: No key needed for local inference.
setup_allSetDesc: Everything is configured. Let's start coding.
prompt_noPlatformKey: No API key — configure in Settings
chat_cliChannelSwitched: Update channel set to {channel}. CLI will update on next restart.
chat_cliChannelDisabledHint: Only takes effect on new sessions
chat_initHintDesc: Run /init to help Claude understand your codebase. This creates a CLAUDE.md file with project documentation.
plan_approvalDesc: Claude has written a plan and is ready to execute. How would you like to proceed?
auth_cliPriorityHint: When both Login and API Key are present, CLI prioritizes API Key
settings_auth_modeCliDesc: CLI manages authentication (Login or configured API Key)
settings_auth_modeAppDesc: App manages authentication (injects env var when starting CLI)
settings_auth_cliLoginDesc: Stored in macOS Keychain via claude login.
settings_auth_appApiKeyDesc: Managed by App, injected as environment variable when starting CLI.
error_guidance_context_limit: The conversation context is too large. Try forking to start fresh with a summary.
error_guidance_budget_limit: Budget limit reached. Adjust max_budget_usd in settings to continue.
error_guidance_auth_issue: Authentication failed. Check your API key or login status in settings.
error_guidance_server_issue: Temporary server issue. Wait a moment and retry.
error_guidance_tool_issue: A tool encountered an error. Check the tool output for details.
error_guidance_unknown: An unexpected error occurred. You can retry or dismiss.
screenshot_notSupported: Screenshot capture is only supported on macOS
cliSync_noSessions: No CLI sessions found for this project
cliSync_usageIncomplete: Some usage data could not be reconstructed
cliSync_usageIncompleteHint: Usage data incomplete — imported from CLI
doctor_projectSkipped: No project directory — project-scope checks skipped
hooks_desc: Shell commands and prompts that run at specific lifecycle events
hooks_noHooksDesc: Hooks let you run commands or prompts at lifecycle events like PreToolUse, PostToolUse, Stop, etc.
hooks_deleteGroupMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this hook group?
hooks_matcherPlaceholder: Tool name pattern (e.g. Bash, Read, Write)
hooks_matcherHelp: Optional: only trigger for matching tool names. Leave empty to match all.
hooks_promptPlaceholder: Prompt to send to the model...
hooks_modelPlaceholder: Model to use for prompt hooks...
hooks_editWarning: Editing rebuilds handler config. Custom fields added manually may be lost.
slashTasks_empty: No background tasks in this session.
chat_addDirSaved:
Directory added: {path}
(will be included on next session start)
chat_addDirUnsupported: add-dir is only supported for Claude agent
skillSelector_empty: No skills found. Add skills in .claude/skills/ to get started.
agent_desc: Manage agent definitions that Claude uses to delegate specialized tasks.
agent_noPluginAgentsDesc: Install plugins that include agent definitions.
agent_deleteConfirm: Delete agent "{name}"? This cannot be undone.
agent_saved: Agent saved. Changes take effect on next session start.
agent_created: Agent created. Changes take effect on next session start.
agent_changesNextSession: Changes take effect on next session start.
agent_nameConflict: Name conflicts with a built-in agent.
agent_renameConflict: An agent with that file name already exists.
agent_nameFormat: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.
